name: spread
constraint: (declare-const CO_SPEC Int)(declare-const CI_SPEC Int)(declare-const RO_SPEC Int)(declare-const RI_SPEC Int)(assert (>= CO_SPEC CI_SPEC))(assert (<= RO_SPEC RI_SPEC))
(declare-const IG_SPEC Int)(declare-const OG_SPEC Int)(assert (= IG_SPEC OG_SPEC))
(declare-const IH_SPEC Int)(declare-const IC_SPEC Int)(declare-const OH_SPEC Int)(assert (>= (+ IC_SPEC IH_SPEC) OH_SPEC))
(declare-const IC_SPEC Int)(declare-const OC_SPEC Int)(assert (>= IC_SPEC OC_SPEC))
